name: Anaconda Snake Simulator
description:
“Beware of the angry anaconda!” there are multiple signs like this in the night city and here is the reason why:
One day the citizens rest at peace in the night city but strange hunting activity seems to be happening in the city which included something like venom and there are many victim seem to be approaching of being prey to an unusual hunting and attack! Research has found that in the forest near the city some unhealthy reptile experiments have been conducting which included snake as their victim product!
The venom of these cobra another snake simulator was being tested and mixed with other snake venom to create a snake hybrid for evil purposes! Soon the scientists experienced a massive blast and from those snake venom emerged a giant-sized anaconda snake!! This anaconda snake killed all those researchers at the spot and freed all the little snakes immediately!
One flaw in these anaconda snake simulator is the fact that they can’t see very well in the light of day so they creep into the civilization by night in the night city. Quietly slithering into humanity to cause havoc! Due to the inappropriate results of the experiments these anaconda snakes are always aggressive so the natives call them angry anaconda!
These night city creeping angry anaconda snakes are dangerous and deadly serpents which slither on a hunting attack every night in the city to find a victim to hunt! Once they have spotted while slithering, a visible victim the angry anaconda snake immediately reacts and attacks like a deadly snake on the victim!
Since the anaconda snake is literally a giant reptile predator possessing a deadly venom and strong hold it is impossible to escape from its reach! If you’re in it to enjoy this amazing snake simulator download the game right away and enjoy the thrill of fierce anaconda snake game! This anaconda attack game includes many features for you to enjoy!
These consist of the inclusion of multiple anaconda and snake simulator snakes with amazing 3D simulation and anaconda attack functions! The joystick enables the anaconda simulator to move around the night city as it will be slithering and creeping into the city based on your controlling! The game allows the anaconda simulator to make the most famous anaconda attack on everything in the city!
This includes hunting and attacking other animals, destroying the city and attacking anyone and anything that comes in the way of the anaconda simulator! The anaconda attack is made of powerful venoms as a result of the experiment so be sure to download this snake game and check out the amazing game play!
HOW TO PLAY GAME:
• Download the game
• Start the game play
• Select the angry anaconda to play with
• Slither in the night city as anaconda simulator
• Use the joystick to move anaconda snake in the city
• Press the on screen attacking button for anaconda attack
• Throw venom on victim and crouch them in tail
• Follow the navigation to reach till victim and perform task within the given time
FEATURES OF THE GAME:
• 3D simulation
• Multiple anaconda snake simulators
• HD night city graphics
• Various snake animal attack options
• On screen joystick which helps snake simulator in slithering and creeping
• Realistic night environment
• Time and target based anaconda attack levels
• Ultimate destruction simulation
